statuemenus.screen.style.crouching.descr: Makes the statue show as if it were crouching.
statuemenus.screen.style.slimArms.descri: Makes the statue's arms a few pixels less wide, like Minecraft's Alex skin.
strawstatues.screen.modelParts.name: Set a player name to take the statue skin from.
strawstatues.screen.modelParts.refreshSk: No statue skin was found. Click to try again.
